The resignation of Andy Coulson , a member of Prime Minister David Cameron 's inner circle, is likely to embarrass David Cameron and call into question his judgement in appointing the editor of a newspaper embroiled in police investigations. We confirm Andy Coulson has resigned, a spokesman for David Cameron 's office said.
